reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress sexy, comfortable, and flattering, particularly noting how it hugs the body and gives a curvy look.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Channel Your Inner Jessica Rabbit!
items.body: I wore this stunning red dress for my Jessica Rabbit costume, and I absolutely love it! As a plus-sized mama, Iâ€™ve always struggled to find outfits that fit well and make me feel confident, but this dress was a game changer. The fabric is stretchy and comfortable, hugging my curves in all the right ways without feeling too tight. It perfectly accentuated my shape while hiding areas I prefer to keep more discreet. The cut is flattering, with a slight flare at the bottom that made me feel both glamorous and comfortable. The vibrant red color popped and made me feel like I was truly channeling Jessica Rabbit, while still feeling like *me* in the best way possible. I received so many compliments all night, and I couldnâ€™t be happier with how it made me look and feel. This dress is a must-have for any special occasion or costume event! Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a confident, flattering fit! Read more
items.author: Seana N.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: Would but In every color tbh. Comfortably sexy. Wore with a feelingirl bodysuit under it, and it covered it perfect. The only thing Iâ€™ll say is that the straps are essentially decorative because the dress fits so well, but they are slightly too long (but Iâ€™m also v short so might be perfect for others.) for reference, Iâ€™m 5â€™3, around 140, double dâ€™s. Length is also perfect with a small heel. Read more
items.author: SeÃ±orita Chili Pepper

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great on, looks cheap off
items.body: I was so excited to try this dress and was hoping to wear it to a wedding in mid-September. However, I was a little disappointed with the quality. The dress felt thin but it's not see through because the inside is lined with a thin, soft, fleece-like material. When I put it on, it was comfortable and looked fantastic. The color and fit was exactly what I wanted, but I could picture myself sweating a ton in this dress because of that inside lining, especially if I'm tearing it up on the dance floor. Not sure what season this dress is supposed to be for, so I ultimately ended up returning it. If the initial look of it doesn't turn you off and you don't sweat much, this could be the dress for you. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality
items.body: Dress was shipped to me with a broken strap. And then when I went to try it on the other strap broke. Soft but very cheap material and quality Read more
items.author: brittany kintz

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars need XS
items.body: Dress was about 3 inches too short- or 3 inches too long. Where it hits was right at the ankle, which made it look like a mistake. Either it needed to be a little shorter to be calf length, or a little longer to graze the floor. Dress has darting to give the dress shape, but the excess darting material that is pinched and sewn is left inside the dress, which creates bulk in the material. The material is stretchy and nice, has a fuzz to the inside, seems either lined with the same material on the inside, or it is just a thick material. Either way, the feeling of the dress was nice and thick and even in neon "green" (looks more like a yellow) i couldn't see my tattoos through the dress. I needed about 2 inches of material cut out from the waist to fit my shape better. The top is fitting, but not necessarily flattering. Maybe larger darting would have helped for it to fit my shape better? Read more
items.author: KMG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ABSOLUTELY PERFECT & FLATTERING
items.body: BEAUTIFUL FIT!! I wore this dress for a formal/white tie event & it was perfect. The material is thick and not see through whatsoever even when you bent down or stretched it! I also tend to struggle finding dresses that fit in all the right spots and this one bet all that. It was form fitting, flattering and extremely comfortable! The color was exactly what I was looking for and the slit was the right length! Will absolutely wear again if I find the right event! Read more
items.author: Gracie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Stunning!
items.body: I bought a pricey dress for a gala I had to attend but unfortunately it ended up not being very flattering, so I turned to Amazon for something comparable that would be here asapâ€¦my plan was to dress it up with lots of jewelry, staple pair of heels, and a nice bag- turns out the dress said enough and I didnâ€™t have to overly compensate to make it look like more than an â€œcheap Amazon findâ€. I was worried about the straps because of some reviews but the straps on mine were just fine, not tearing. I ended up absolutely loving this dress and the fit! I was impressed and Iâ€™m so glad I grabbed this. I was able to sit comfortably and dance all night. The slit isnâ€™t too high, I think itâ€™s perfect, but itâ€™s definitely a statement! It doesnâ€™t breath super well, if you sweat easily you may get sweat marks, definitely glad our event was in a cold ballroom! I wouldnâ€™t wear this in the super hot summer weather. I ordered the black, so Iâ€™m not sure if the other colors have the same material. Oh, and it definitely shows underwear lines so plan accordingly- seamless or nothingðŸ˜¬ For reference right now Iâ€™m 5â€™8 and 142 lbs. I lose and gain weight easily so my dress size ranges from 6-10 (medium-large) depending on where Iâ€™m at size-wise. Right now Iâ€™m more of a medium, I ordered the medium and Iâ€™m happy with this size! It fit like a glove and even had enough length to wear 3 inch heels. I will edit and upload a pic here when I get them (had a little too much fun in my dress and forgot to take pics so I need to get some from friendsðŸ˜…) Read more
items.author: Bri

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Weird construction and top
items.body: I got this dress in white. It might work better in other colors Pros: thick enough, not see through. Length was normal and slit wasnâ€™t too revealing. Cons: fabric felt cheap but was also lined in fleece? I donâ€™t know what but it felt strange. The straps were thin and are that round knitted material, not fabric. The top also felt like a tube top and cut into my chest. The front seams were very weird, one went down the side and just stopped in the stomach. The other went all the way down to the slit. Maybe in a different color this is all less noticeable but in white it just looked bad. True to size Read more
items.author: Anastacia C.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, White, Neongreen, Royalblue, Black, Orange, Armygreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
